name: Therese
title: Excellent Lawyer
body: Mr. Shin Cho is my lawyer who took my moving violation and had it reduced so that it would not give me any points on my license and it kept my insurance from going up. He is very professional and I would high recommend him.

name: Bill
title: Get it gone
body: I was charged with possession of a controlled substance ,meth  and a traffic ticket , all of which Shin told me not to worry after he heard my side and received the discovery and in just over three months he got it dismissed. He kept me informed and answered any questions I had. He put me at ease and then proved his worth. Thanks Shin , freedom is priceless!

name: Kelly
title: MOST RECOMMENDABLE LAWYER
body: He was recommended to me and it was such a great decision to give him a call! I had court for two things for not having an insurance card up to date and with a high speeding ticket and he amended it to Illegal parking. He was very informative and helpful with every step of the way! I really do recommend him! HE IS AWESOME AT HIS JOB.

name: Nehrudin
title: Great criminal defense attorney
body:
I was charged with a 2nd degree felony assault and Shin got it dropped down to a class A harassment misdemeanor in less than 6 months with my immigration status being at risk as well. 
Thatâ€™s with a few of my violations, Shin still kept me out of jail and was still able to resolve the case fast!
Professional and friendly attorney who is responsive and will answer any of your questions anytime of the day including weekends. I would definitely recommend Shin to anyone in any kind of trouble including personal injury, DWI and DUI.

name: Mitch
title: Shin is who you want in your corner
body: Shin is the most hands on and dedicated lawyer in the area (IMO). He takes the time to really understand your situation completely and thoroughly reviews all facts. He is the one you want in your corner when you're up against the justice system in any scenario.

name: John
title: Illinois Traffic Ticket
body: Shin Cho was very helpful with a traffic ticket issue in Illinois. I was very pleased at the results and will definitely use him again.

name: Nancy
title: Missouri Charge reduced
body: I had a great experience with using The Law Office Of Shin Cho , Very professional , communicative and persistent. I was very satisfied in the results of my case.I will hire him in the future if I ever need a lawyer again !  I have and will continue to refer Shin Co in the future  to friends and family.

name: Ben
title: It's the little things
body: I hired Shin before he was out on his own and over a year later when it was realized that the court system had screwed up some of my paperwork, it was Shin that I called to help me sort it out. Not being with the firm anymore, he could have easily just pointed me back towards his old firm to help sort it out. Instead he took it on himself, for free, and sorted it out no questions asked. I am also an extremely busy person with my career, so it is important to me to be able to communicate efficiently, and often at non-standard business hours. Shin made that easy and I didn't even have to ask. Right from the start he was accessible to me when I needed him to be and was always quick to reply by phone, email, or text. There is no doubt that Shin is a fine lawyer, but it is the little things that separate Shin and make him a cut above the rest.

name: Kevin
title: Responsive, Compassionate and Diligent
body: I live out of state and was charged with a small possession charge in Missouri; on the way to a wedding. I found Shin on Avvo and during our first email exchange - he immediately calmed me down. He listened engagingly to my story, got all the details, asked what my ideal outcome would be and then gave me some different scenarios based on the knowledge & information he had. He executed on exactly what needed to be done and ended up getting charges dropped and never having to go to court and just having to paying a fine. Not only did Shin get what I wanted out of court - but he listened and followed through on every interaction we had and gave me peace of mind that my case was being taken care of while explaining each step. I couldn't give a higher recommendation and he is your guy if you are in the "my life is over" thinking I was in when searching for a lawyer.

name: Emily
title: Results!
body: Shin was excellent! He worked with me to get the results that I wanted. He didn't beat around the bush and was up front with me about the entire process. He got my DWI case straightened out and I was more than pleased with the results. He is a lawyer who cares and will do everything he can to help you. I don't ever plan on needing his services again but I will definitely recommend him to anyone I know and care about that finds themselves in a similar situation.

name: Debbie
title: Excellent Lawyer
body: I highly recommend Shin as a lawyer.  He helped us when our son had a DWI.  He was patient with us.  He was very thorough and reviewed the case completely.  Because of his understanding of law and his hard work, we were able to get positive results.

name: Brian
title: Highly recommended
body: Stayed with me through the entire process. His guidance was invaluable. All throughout the appeals process his perseverance helped bring a favorable result to my case.

name: Terry
title: Outstanding! Highly Recommend
body: I would definitely recommend calling Mr. Cho if you are in need of legal services. Mr. Cho really takes the time to go over everything with you in detail, also VERY professional. I had my fair shares of lawyers in the past and its comforting that I have one Lawyer that I trust to handle everything the right way!

name: Michael
title: Great experience!
body: Shin Cho was super helpful in fixing my ticket to turn it into a non-moving violation and make sure there are no points on my license. The process was super quick and efficient! Thank you so much for your help!

name: anonymous
title: Wonderful Attorney
body: Shin is down to earth and will take the time to make sure you are kept informed as your case develops. Unlike other lawyers who only seem to contact you when the bill is due, he's responsive to client calls. Shin really has his clients' best interest at heart and constantly goes the extra mile for them. If you're looking for a lawyer who will truly be on your team, Shin is the lawyer for you.

name: Pat
title: "Truely a Blessing"
body: I needed a atternoy  base off of me coming from a lounge and being stopped and charged with an DWI. I had never been in trouble as well as I'm a license nurse, so I was beyond scared, because I knew this could affect my permeant record and my career. Jcs Law had great reviews and testimonies of really helping people, so I called, made a consultation appointment, and from that day forward I was at ease. Jcs Law confirm to me that they would "fight for me" and everything would be fine. Well, they definitely stood by their word, my case was concluded with great results and I thank Jcs Laws and(particularly) atternoy Shin Cho for all their hard work, keeping in touch with me,and their honesty. Thank you again.

name: anonymous
title: Fantastic, trustworthy lawyer
body: Shin handled a criminal matter for me, and was a pleasure to work with. He was always responsive, and kept me informed on the progress of my case as it went along. He got me a great result and I would recommend him to anyone looking for aggressive representation!

name: anonymous
title: Shin is the Best!
body: There is a lot of vulnerability and hogwash out there when it comes time that you need, and should choose an attorney. I was looking for great reviews, great track record and from a great practice. Shin delivers. What impressed me most was his authenticity, level-headed was and honesty right upfront. He is soft spoken, compassionate and a great choice. Just give him a call and see what I am talking about. He helped me very much with a probation violation from out of state.

name: anonymous
title: Great Attorney
body: Shin met with me on his off day and called me throughout the process to get my issue resolved in a timely manner with no issues.

name: Brandi
title: Swooped in and saved the day!!
body: My orinigal lawyer skipped out on me before my case was finished. I was introduced to Shin by a friend and he seriously saved me before my case became really bad. He is professional, right to the point and handled my case with the upmost professionalism! I recommend him to everyone!

name: Johnny
title: Excellent lawyer!
body: Mr. Shin Cho took care of a speeding ticket of mine. He was very polite, and handled everything with the upmost professionalism. Will use his services again and will definitely recommend to my friends and family.

name: Anne
title: Speeding Ticket
body: Shin was wonderful! He was able to get my speeding ticket amended to a non moving violation and even convinced the prosecutor to lower the fees!! Shin is a total life saver and I would recommend him to anyone!

name: anonymous
title: Excellent
body: Shin was a very professional and organized lawyer. He helped me out with a case in 2016 and I received great news every phone call and he was a huge help with getting my case dropped. I would hire him again and would recommend him to anyone. I promise you will not be disappointed with his work. He was one hundred percent on my side and was always willing to answer any questions.

name: Alicia
title: Shin is the Best!
body: I am very pleased with the work that  Attorney Shin Cho did for my family. He definitely knows the law. He has always been available on short notice, he is very prompt and willing to listen. His professionalism, hard work, professional advice and willingness to help is what sets him apart. I will recommend him to my family, friends and clients b/c I know he will take care of them. Shin you are the Best! Thank you for helping me and my family!
